name: The Unmarked
description:
This family friendly first person shooter is full of adventure, places to explore, and a story to be unfolded.
You explore a incredible hand designed world full of secrets and hidden Items, Your goal is to unfold the story of the lost soldier.

What can you expect?

- A Hand Crafted World
- Unique Atmosphere switching between cartoon and modern day worlds
- Open Area Levels
- Challenging Enemies
- Exclusive Soundtrack
- A lovingly handcrafted and detailed world.
- Updates and new content
- Cartoon styled Graphics
- Hidden Guns and Notes to find

Who am I?
I'm Nick, a 22 year old living in the heart of the city.
I decided to create a personal project while being stuck at home during the 2020 crisis,
this is my first ever indie title and I'm excited to share it with you!
I will continue to update and release new levels for this title: The Unmarked

Basic Controls
Standard FPS Controls
B = Backpack
